sentences.english: The cotton grows well with high yield mainly by first and second irrigation.
sentences.chinese: 棉花生长期长势良好，产量主要靠一水和二水来完成。

sentences.english: Compared with three time irrigations in spring, water use efficiency of twice irrigations was increased.
sentences.chinese: 春灌二水与春灌三水的产量相近，但水分利用率提高。

sentences.english: Magnesium phthalate dihydrate was synthesized by rheological phase reaction.
sentences.chinese: 用流变相反应法合成了二水邻苯二甲酸镁。

sentences.english: All OSs are required to paint hull today.
sentences.chinese: 今天要求所有的二水刷船壳。
